title: “Well that was terrible.”
description: Jon, Jon, Tommy, and Dan break down Donald Trump’s acceptance speech and discuss how the Republican National Convention will shape the final 67 days of the 2020 campaign.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
